body_html:
Hi, quantization efforts have been prioritized for TensorFlow Lite.

Besides that quantized unfused batch norm can result in accuracy issues that we haven't explored fully yet, especially if the entire model is being run in uint8. That being said we will be releasing more tools to quantize TensorFlow Lite models that should address and avoid this eventually.
body_text:
Hi, quantization efforts have been prioritized for TensorFlow Lite.
Besides that quantized unfused batch norm can result in accuracy issues that we haven't explored fully yet, especially if the entire model is being run in uint8. That being said we will be releasing more tools to quantize TensorFlow Lite models that should address and avoid this eventually.
body:
Hi, quantization efforts have been prioritized for TensorFlow Lite.

Besides that quantized unfused batch norm can result in accuracy issues that we haven't explored fully yet, especially if the entire model is being run in uint8. That being said we will be releasing more tools to quantize TensorFlow Lite models that should address and avoid this eventually.
